name: Shrimp Pasta Salad With Dill
author: soggytomato
summary: Dill gives this beautiful, creamy, shrimp pasta salad a fresh taste. This is a very attractive dish. Perfect for potlucks. Garnish with toasted pecans or a sprig of fresh dill.
ingredients: ¼ cup frozen peas, thawed and drained
1 stalk celery, thinly sliced on the diagonal
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat oil in a cast iron skillet over medium-high heat
Cook shrimp until they are bright pink on the outside and the meat is opaque, about 5 minutes
Immediately immerse shrimp in a bowl of cold water and let cool, at least 10 minutes
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 10 to 11 minutes
Drain pasta and transfer to a large bowl
Add shrimp, mayonnaise, sour cream, peas, celery, red onion, lemon juice, dill, sugar, salt, and pepper to the bowl
Chill at least 2 hours before serving
